name: Kill Him With Tea
description:
Type:       Bossfight, Simulation, VR experience
Support:   HTC Vive, Playstation VR, Oculus
Public:     PEGI +16

Will you manage to discreetly poison each of the twelve monstrous lords? 
Play as a powerful witch performing various tea ceremonies in a VR experience. Each lord has his own behavior and you shall satisfy all their demands to avoid being eaten alive.

 It's a 4-month end-year school project, inspired by traditionnal tea ceremony and epic boss fights, made by 9 ENJMIN students in 2018 with Unreal Engine.

Controls

The game is playable with an HTC headset and controllers. You can do every actions with the trigger of the controller (hold it to keep an object in your hand).
